overview: Vincent enters college with the tenacity of succeeding with things the way he did back in high school. He did so by dealing with things alone. One day, he receives a call from his father. His father says that there will be a delay in Vincent’s allowance due to a problem in their farm. Although bad news, Vincent accepted this as a challenge that he could easily move through. He realizes with each day that passes by that he can’t be more wrong.
title: This Day
